column4: UPDATE 4-No more Tesla buyback guarantee as company cuts price of Model X
column5: SAN FRANCISCO/DETROIT  July 13 Tesla Motors Inc  has ended a program that guaranteed the resale value of its cars  and lowered the starting price of its Model X crossover  the high-profile electric vehicle maker said on Wednesday.

column4: U.S. safety agency seeks answers on fatal Tesla Autopilot crash
column5: WASHINGTON U.S. highway safety regulators have demanded that Tesla Motors Inc hand over detailed information about the design  operation and testing of its Autopilot technology following a May 7 fatal crash in which the system was in use.
